elementary.title: Elementary
elementary.description: Our beginner course will help you master the basics: alphabet, grammar, speaking skills, and readiness to communicate in English.

intermediate.title: Pre-Intermediate
intermediate.description: Designed for learners with basic English skills who want to improve grammar, expand vocabulary, and speak more confidently.

upper.title: Upper-Intermediate
upper.description: Advanced English course focusing on speaking, grammar, vocabulary, reading complex texts, and engaging in deep discussions.

about.title: About Me:
about.text: I have a background in English language and linguistics, and I’ve been actively teaching students of different ages and levels. My English proficiency is at a solid C1 level – I speak fluently, write clearly, and have a strong command of grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation.
